heading: Can I stay while you groom my dog?
content: Yes of course, please feel free to stay if you wish to although please be aware that space can be quite tight and it may end up being a rather wet and fluffy occassion.

heading: Where are you based?
content: We are based on Cold Ash Hill in Cold Ash, Newbury. The easiest way to find us is if you are coming up the hill we are on the farm immediately opposite Collaroy Road, alternatively if you are coming down the hill we are the first right after the post office.

heading: Do you handstrip?
content: I am sorry but unfortunately at this moment in time I do not offer hand stripping as a service.

heading: From what age can I have my dog groomed?
content: There is no definite answer to this as it depends ultimately on the breed of dog and their type of coat but the bare minimum we accept is once your dog has had their second injection for obvious health precaution reasons.
